content: For a small project, i want to emebed a small DSL with probabilistic constructs (in order to be able to extract an AST), I followed a small tutorial (using the elaborator), but i'm stuck on how to deal with floats (i really need them since i'm working with probabilistic constructs...), it's not mentionned in the file that defines numeric literals (Parser/Extra.lean). Is there an easy way to parse floats ?
I think that it might be my last resort...
